queries.query: select fecha_lote,emisor,importe_txn,adquirente from det_adq_prbr inner join bines_emisor_8 b on SUBSTRING(num_cuenta FROM 1 FOR 8)=b.bin where fecha_lote between ? and ? and b.marca_producto = ? and cod_tra='05' and cod_razon='00' and codigo_uso='1' and emisor='12'
